com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.matcher
Class AbstractLinkDescriptorFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.matcher.AbstractLinkDescriptorFactory

public abstract class AbstractLinkDescriptorFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory to create link descriptors of a particular type.

Create a link descriptor for a unit to unit link.

Parameters:

source - the source unit
target - the target unit

createLinkDescriptor

public abstract LinkDescriptor createLinkDescriptor(LinkType type,
                                                    DeployModelObject source,
                                                    DeployModelObject target,
                                                    int linkWeight)
Create a link descriptor for a unit to unit link.

Parameters:
type - type of the link; cannot be DEPENDENCY
source - the source unit
target - the target unit
linkWeight - weight (priority) to be assigned to the link
Returns:
the link descriptor

createLinkDescriptor

public abstract LinkDescriptor createLinkDescriptor(LinkType type,
                                                    Unit source,
                                                    Requirement sourceRequirement,
                                                    Unit target,
                                                    Capability targetCapability)
Creates a link descriptor for a capability to requirement link.

Parameters:
type - the type of the link
source - the source unit
sourceRequirement - the source requirement; must be non-null for dependency links; may be null for logical link; must be null for hosting and unit collection links
target - the target unit
targetCapability - the target capability; must be non-null for dependency links; may be null for logical link; must be null for hosting and unit collection links
Returns:
the link descriptor

createLinkDescriptor

public abstract LinkDescriptor createLinkDescriptor(LinkType type,
                                                    Unit source,
                                                    Requirement sourceRequirement,
                                                    Unit target,
                                                    Capability targetCapability,
                                                    int linkWeight)
Creates a link descriptor for a capability to requirement link.

Parameters:
type - the type of the link
source - the source unit
sourceRequirement - the source requirement; must be non-null for dependency links; may be null for logical link; must be null for hosting and unit collection links
target - the target unit
targetCapability - the target capability; must be non-null for dependency links; may be null for logical link; must be null for hosting and unit collection links
linkWeight - weight (priority) to be assigned to the link
Returns:
the link descriptor
